Values.name: Plasma Storm
Values.dialogue_text: The <> looks pretty dangerous. There isn't much you can do about it.
Values.hazard_damage_text: An energy surge from a <> scorches your hull for {0} damage!

Values.name: Dense Kelp Tangle
Values.dialogue_text: The wavy field of <> is filled with razor sharp stalks as far as your scanners can detect.
Values.look_text: An undulating <> will be hard to navigate.
Values.hazard_damage_text: A tentacle surges from a <> and tears into your hull for {0} damage!

Values.name: Asteroid Field
Values.dialogue_text: An uncountable number of masses from the <> whirl through space. It looks like you could get hit at any time.
Values.look_text: The sector is saturated with an <>
Values.hazard_damage_text: Something massive from the <> smashes into your hull for {0} damage!

Values.name: Plasma Discharge
Values.dialogue_text: The <> looks pretty dangerous. There isn't much you can do about it.
Values.hazard_damage_text: An energy discharge from a <> slams into your hull for {0} damage!
Values.telegraph_damage_text: An energy discharge from a <> will release next tick!
